statement.p: Find a basis for the subspace W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ -1 \\ 2 \\ 3 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -1 \\ 2 \\ -1 \\ -2 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 10 \\ -8 \\ -14 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ -9 \\ 9 \\ 15 \end{array}\right]\right\}. Be sure to explain why your result is a basis.
